title: Update Internet Identity alternative origins configuration

requirements.text: Overwrite the content of frontend/public/.well-known/ii-alternative-origins with the following exact JSON: {"alternativeOrigins": ["https://v2.aftabstore.com","https://www.v2.aftabstore.com","https://aftabstore.com","https://www.aftabstore.com"]}

quotes: Overwrite the following content in ii-alternative-origins: {"alternativeOrigins": ["https://v2.aftabstore.com","https://www.v2.aftabstore.com","https://aftabstore.com","https://www.aftabstore.com"]}

acceptanceCriteria: The file contains exactly the specified JSON content with all four domain URLs

constraints: Do not modify any other files in the project
Preserve the exact JSON formatting and domain URLs as specified
